channel.title: Comments on: Milk & Honey
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Orderâ„¢

item.title: By: ListlessSpectre
item.dc:creator: ListlessSpectre
item.description: Imagine raw honey mixed with a little bit of milk and it's spot on. You can relate to this by using Honey Nut Cheerios as an example and then taking the nuts and cereal flavor away....if that makes sense. Really smooth, sweet and mellow flavor and highly recommended to anyone who likes cereal flavored juices.
item.content:encoded: Imagine raw honey mixed with a little bit of milk and it’s spot on. You can relate to this by using Honey Nut Cheerios as an example and then taking the nuts and cereal flavor away….if that makes sense. Really smooth, sweet and mellow flavor and highly recommended to anyone who likes cereal flavored juices.
